rules.description: Finder shortcuts (f2, cmd+enter, alt+q, (shift) delete, cmd + shift + s to hide, cmd + x to cut)
caps_lock to right_cmd/ctrl, caps_lock + ; --> End_of_line (cmd + ->)
cmd + (shift) + tab --> right_ctrl + (shift) + tab, ctrl + tab --> Mission Control
switch escape and backquote
left_ctrl + hjkl to arrow keys
left_ctrl + space, d to mouse-click, show-desktop, alfred (if alone)
left_alt + q, a to cmd + q, h
left_alt + hl to cmd + [] (go back, forward)
Windows like word / line navigation (cmd + (shift) + left, right, Home, End)
Launch apps (alt + w,f,1,2 --> Finder, Firefox, iTerm, vscode)
cmd + shift + x --> cmd + , (preferences)
Mouse buttons (back/forth - for finder, navigate desktop (with cmd))
F5 for chrome
pdf vi navigation
